Text: While some of this music is meant for adults (and may be considered pornographic by some religious groups), this torrent does not actually contain any pornography. Sorry! Please seed the fuck out of this with your computer, your sperm, whatever it takes!!!!!!!!!!! Enjoy & Rock On...

Additionally, all of these albums have been compressed into a .zip file. The music is mostly 320 kbps mp3s, with a few at 192 kbps and some of the earliest recordings at 128 kbps (since better transcoding software was not widely available). All tracks have been tagged correctly, though a few folders contain newer album covers then the ones tagged to the tracks. After downloading and unzipping, we recommend that you drop the whole folder into Winamp, kick back with bong hits and beer, then shuffle play the collection for a few days (or until you pass out). NOTE: Some folders contain an .m3u playlist file titled Correct Track Order.m3u so don't worry if some files show up twice in your playlist.
